text: Te loka kaphira (inkari) jhaleta, jyanni mhatale ki mariyamaca putra masiha haca allaha ahe, vastavika masihane (svatah) mhatale ki he isra'ilacya putranno! Majhya ani tumacya palanakartya allahaci upasana kara karana jo koni allahasobata dusaryala sahabhagi tharavila tara allahane tyacyasathi jannata harama keli ahe ani tyace thikana jahannama ahe, ani atyacari lokanca konihi madata karanara nasela
